name: java-enhancements
description: Java-specific analysis enhancements for file summaries
additionalInstructions: Identify ALL annotations (@Override, @Service, @RestController, @Entity, @Autowired, etc.) with their purposes
For classes: note if they are interfaces, abstract classes, or concrete implementations
Document inheritance: extends relationships and implements relationships with all interfaces
List access modifiers (public, private, protected, package-private) for each member
For Spring components: note dependency injection patterns (@Autowired, constructor injection, setter injection)
Identify design patterns (Singleton, Factory, Builder, etc.) if present
Note exception handling patterns (try-catch blocks, throws declarations, custom exceptions)
For JPA entities: list fields, relationships (@OneToMany, @ManyToOne), and cascade types
Document static methods and fields with their purposes
List generic type parameters and their constraints (<T extends SomeClass>)
